content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 6, 2019 Is The Email Security Industry About To Lose Another Major Vendor? September 6, 2019 Symantecs acquisition by Broadcom, announced recently, represents yet another major change for this cyber security vendor and service provider. Given the explicitly stated intention to focus only on the largest 2000 organisations globally, only time will tell what the impact will be on its smaller enterprise and mid-market customers.
